Introduction

Bekah is a Korean-American designer and singer. She is best known as a former member of After School from 2009 to 2011. She is currently working outside the entertainment industry and reflects on her times as an idol.

On December 29, 2008, Bekah made her first unofficial appearance with After School at the SBS Song Festival, serving as a backup dancer for Son Dam-bi.

On June 17, 2011, Bekah 'graduated' from After School after concluding promotions for the group's studio album 'VIRGIN'. She released her graduation song "Take Me to the Place" on July 11.
